name: Xenoblade Chronicles 3
description: Join Noah and Mio, members of the two opposing nations at the center of this conflict, on a heartfelt journey to end the cycle of violence. A group of six characters from these nations join together to awaken the colonies of Aionios to the underlying threat both nations face. Traverse massive, fantastical sci-fi landscapes as you expose the true enemy pulling the strings behind the conflicts.

name: Kirby's Dream Buffet
description: Roll through a smorgasbord of food-themed stages in 4 rounds of 4-player* fun as Kirby…who seems rounder than usual? Race through delicious obstacle courses to collect strawberries as Kirby grows. Then, turn the tides in the final round—a fruity fight atop a floating platform.

name: Super Smash Bros. Ultimate
description: Smash rivals off the stage as new characters Simon Belmont and King K. Rool join Inkling, Ridley, and every fighter in Super Smash Bros. history. Enjoy enhanced speed and combat at new stages based on the Castlevania series, Super Mario Odyssey, and more!

name: Nintendo Switch - OLED Model White set
description: Introducing the newest member of the Nintendo Switch family Play at home on the TV or on-the-go with a vibrant 7-inch OLED screen with the Nintendo Switch system - OLED model.

name: Joy-Con Set (L+R) - Neon Pink/Neon Green
description: One controller or two, vertical or sideways, motion controls or buttons…Joy‑Con and Nintendo Switch give you total gameplay flexibility.

name: Nintendo Switch Carrying Case & Screen Protector
description: Help protect your Nintendo Switch system when you’re on the go with the Nintendo Switch Carrying Case & Screen Protector.

name: Animal Crossing - Nintendo Switch Mini Backpack - Teal Leaves
description: This cute, Premium Animal Crossing bag & mini backpack stores the Nintendo Switch or Nintendo Switch Lite systems for easy portability with enough internal space for accessories and your charging cable.

name: Mushroom Kingdom Collection - Mario & Goomba Mug
description: Enjoy your morning coffee, evening tea, or anytime sundae with this delightful mug featuring Mario and a garrison of Goombas.

name: Mario 10 inch Plush
description: Bring home a soft & cuddly, officially licensed Super Mario 10 inch plush toy.
